note.p: Birth: Ales, Gard, France (14 or 15 July 1800)
Memberships: Royal Academy of Sciences, Paris
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1884 vol 37 pp x-xxvii signed by A W Hofmann
References: Sir Harold Hartley, 'Stanislao Cannizzaro, FRS (1826-1910) and the First International Chemical Conference at Karlsruhe in 1860' in NR 1966 vol 21 pp 56-63
K K Schwarz, 'Faraday and Babbage' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp367-381
J S Rowlinson, 'The work of Thomas Andrews and James Thomson on the liquefaction of gases' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 143-159
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 14 July 1800
